snippet: Bought by Tracey Stewart and her husband Jon, the former host of “The Daily Show,” Bufflehead Farm, in Middletown, N.J., will be a home for abused farm animals.
abstract: Tracey Stewart, animal rights activist and wife of comedian Jon Stewart, is set to open home for abused animals at Bufflehead Farm, 12-acre plot couple has bought in Middletown (Metropolitan/New Jersey).

keywords.value: Do Unto Animals: A Friendly Guide to How Animals Live, and How We Can Make Their Lives Better (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: Bought by Tracey Stewart and her husband Jon, the former host of “The Daily Show,” Bufflehead Farm, in Middletown, N.J., will be a home for abused farm animals.

headline.print_headline: Counting Sheep, and Piglets, and More
headline.main: Tracey Stewart Counts Her Sheep, and More
